about_the_game:
This Demo version gives you 2 out of the 6 total sessions you play with Tessa.

Ticklish Tessa is a short interactive erotic BDSM game focused on tickling and teasing in a consensual and playful setting.

It's part visual novel and part interactive clicker.

In this game your goal is to help out Tessa: A stressed-out corporate mouse woman with many responsibilities.



For Tessa's circumstance that help involves some playful tickling and consensual BDSM.



In Ticklish Tessa you can:
  • Pick Tessa's gender appearance as female or male.
  • Interact with Tessa in eight different ways to tickle, tease, and pleasure them.
  • Use bondage on Tessa and pick different outfits for them.
  • Engage with Tessa over multiple sessions and dates.
  • Watch tons of lovely animations and reactions.

content_descriptors.notes:
Ticklish Tessa involves consensual sexual acts between an adult-aged anthropomorphic character and the unseen player. 

These acts are focused around the sexual acts and fetishes of tickling, footplay, foot worship, bondage, and massaging.

There are no non-consensual scenes present in this game.
